channel.title: Pasosh on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Pasosh on Rusland 1

item.title: Pasosh – Stop, Max
item.description: So stop, Макс. Макс? Ма-а-акс! (Lyrics) More about Pasosh / Пасош (from Moscow) on Wikipedia, Bandcamp, Facebook, Instagram, VK, and their website. Most of the music here is also in an R1 playlist on YouTube (in order of release).
